Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 12 Apr 2019Do you agree with their analysis?What was the buy criteria for you? Was it void by the OCBC analysis? There are many analysts churning out such reports, different research instituitions can even have differing views. OCBC may say sell another bank might say buy. The real question is what did your research tell you when you decided to pull the trigger and buy?0 comments0
